column5: Anyone know what the perch are like off the piers on Erie right now?  Any info would be great  Daev
Heard they have been hitting, not in great numbers, but they have been caught. Try to change your locations along the pier and up the river and you might find a few of them trying to get educated.
Lake Erie perch like the following baits:  1) Emerald shiners  2) Emerald shiners  3) Emerald shiners  4) Emerald shiners  5) Emerald shiners  We'll you get the idea

You could also just get off your tookish and just come down and fish anywayzz...... I took a stroll along the pier yesterday evening, A few guys fishing .  Fishing off the pier right now is  like a light bulb.
